articles.title: Papers Call for Turning Out in Spring Tree Planting
articles.content:
Papers Call for Turning Out in Spring Tree Planting
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Today marks the Tree-planting Day.
					 President Kim Il Sung climbed Moran Hill together with leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk long ago and unrolled a grandiose plan to turn the country into a picturesque people's paradise by planting many trees in mountains and fields.
					
					 The instructions given by the President that significant day provided a historic occasion in kindling a torch for tree planting. As a result, the spring general mobilization for land management starts in the DPRK with tree planting.
					
					 Papers of the DPRK Sunday editorially call on all people to turn out in the tree-planting campaign this day.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the tree-planting movement is a noble patriotic work for people's happiness and the prosperity of the country and nature-remaking work of lasting significance.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Timber is needed for stepping up the building of modern factories, cities and rural villages. There should be also timber to mine more coal and minerals and to develop agriculture.
					
					 Thick forests are required for preventing natural disasters and making air clean and a lot of trees for protecting land.
					
					 We should turn out in the spring tree-planting drive to creditably fulfill our duty as citizens of the DPRK, bearing deep in mind the significance and importance of creating woodland.
					
					 Minju Joson calls on all officials and other people to fully display patriotic enthusiasm in the spring tree-planting campaign this significant year and thus make a positive contribution to turning the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed in Field of Ideology
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed in Field of Ideology
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has powerfully demonstrated its dignity and might as a full-fledged politico-ideological power before the whole world. This is a valuable fruition of the outstanding leadership Kim Jong Il provided by steering the Korean revolution along the road of victory only by holding fast to the ideology backed by arms, regarding it as a mighty treasured sword.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il set forth in his early years the Juche-oriented theory that ideology decides everything. He worked heart and soul to intensify the ideological work, implementing the line of giving priority to ideology in the whole period of leading the revolution.
					
					 He developed the party, power and invincible revolutionary Paektusan army by holding fast to the ideology and brought about epoch-making innovations in the socialist construction by motivating people ideologically.
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, the Korean people could work miracles and perform feats by raising a strong wind of speed campaign in every worksite for the great socialist construction in the 1970s and glorify the 1980s as the greatest heyday in the era of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK worked such historic miracles as achieving a great victory in the battle for protecting socialism and establishing a solid foundation for building a thriving nation by resolutely foiling all the counter-revolutionary moves of the imperialist allied forces in the 1990s when the destiny of the country and nation was at stake, in particular. This would be unthinkable without the extraordinary leadership of Kim Jong Il, who consolidated the ideological position of the country as firm as an invulnerable fortress.
					
					 The undying exploits Kim Jong Il performed by making a brilliant history of building a thriving nation unprecedented in human history by dint of ideology and mental power of all the service personnel and people will always remain shining along with the successful advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Algerian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Algerian President
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday in a message congratulated Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, upon his 77th birthday.
					 The Korean people rejoice as over their own over the steady socio-economic progress being made by the friendly Algerian people while consolidating their national unity under the unerring leadership of their president, the message said.
					
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, the message sincerely hoped that the president would always enjoy good health and happiness and register new bigger success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Korean Victims of U.S. Massive Air-Raids on Tokyo Held
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Korean Victims of U.S. Massive Air-Raids on Tokyo Held
						
 Tokyo, March 1 (KNS-KCNA) -- A memorial service for Korean victims was given in Tokyo Saturday on the lapse of 69 years since the U.S. massive air raids on Tokyo.
					 Present there were Jin Kil Sang, director of the Rights and Welfare Department of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Han Jong Suk, vice-chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, other officials of Chongryon, Koreans in Japan and Japanese people.
					
					 The participants observed a moment silence in memory of the victims.
					
					 Read out at the service was a memorial message sent by the Association of Korean Victims of Forcible Drafting and Their Bereaved Families of the DPRK.
					
					 The message noted that more than 10 000 Koreans who were grievously killed by the air raids of U.S. forces while being subject to harsh national discrimination and slave labor after being taken away to Japan are victims of the overseas invasion by Japan and forcible drafting perpetrated by it, pursuant to its policy to exterminate the Korean nation.
					
					 However, the right-wing forces in Japan are running the whole gamut of gimmicks to justify its past war of aggression and cover up the truth behind the war crimes including forcible drafting by making profound confusing of right and wrong, far from honestly reflecting on the stark historical fact, it noted, adding:
					
					 The letter urged the Japanese authorities to kneel down before the victims who met grievous death due to Japan and beg for their pardon.
					
					 Also read out there was a memorial message sent by the south Korean committee for supporting the investigation into the damage done by forcible drafting in the period of the resistance war against Japan and its overseas victims.
					
					 Speeches were made by the representative of the Tokyo Ward Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship, co-representative of the Japanese national liaison council of the Fact-Finding Group for the Probe into the Truth about the Forcible Drafting of Koreans, representative of the Tokyo group for the probe into the truth about the forcible drafting of Koreans, etc.
					
					 The speakers said now is the time to probe the truth about the crimes and other wrong acts perpetrated by Japan against the Koreans killed in an alien land without having any chance to go back home.

articles.title: S. Korean Lawyer Terms Trial of Attempted Rebellion Judgment Tailored to Prearranged Conclusion
articles.content:
S. Korean Lawyer Terms Trial of Attempted Rebellion Judgment Tailored to Prearranged Conclusion
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Lawyer Kim Chil Jun, head of the joint defence counsel of the attempted rebellion case of south Korea, said that the charge of the rebellion brought against those related to the Unified Progressive Party case was groundless, according to the south Korean internet paper "Genuine World". 
					 He, addressing a meeting held at a hall in Jongdong of Seoul on Thursday to hear a report on the trial of the attempted rebellion, branded the judgment made at the trial of the case as the ruling tailored to the prearranged decision, based on groundless antipathy. 
					
					 He went on: The prosecution and court termed a lecture on the situation given by Ri Sok Gi, lawmaker from the Unified Progressive Party, on May 12 last year "a meeting of the revolutionary organization for attempted rebellion". 
					
					 If one listens to the recorded lecture titled "What shall we do for peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean peninsula," one can know that it is far from an attempted rebellion or agitation for it. 
					
					 Kim Chil Jun expressed the will to make all efforts to probe the truth behind the case to the last.

articles.title: Remains of Civilians Killed during War Unearthed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Remains of Civilians Killed during War Unearthed in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Remains of civilians who were killed during the last June 25 war were unearthed in Jinju, South Kyongsang Province of south Korea, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 It was reported that thousands of people related to the Association of the Protected and prisoners of Jinju Prison were mercilessly killed in five places of Jinju by the counter-intelligence corps of the U.S. forces and south Korean MPs early during the last war.
					
					 A joint investigation team for discovering remains of civilians killed during the war started unearthing of remains from February 24. The joint team included the Institute for National Studies and other organizations. 
					
					 A lot of U.S.-made discharged cartridges and bullets were unearthed on the spot. 
					
					 The truth about the killing of innocent civilians by the U.S. imperialists and Syngman Rhee group of traitors can neither be concealed nor written off, no matter how much water may have flow under the bridge.

articles.title: February Issue of Magazine "Paektu-Hanna" Published
articles.content:
February Issue of Magazine "Paektu-Hanna" Published
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China brought out the February issue of magazine "Paektu-Hanna".
					 The magazine allotted much space to the news that Marshal Kim Jong Un looked round the baby home and orphanage in Pyongyang, illustrated with his photo.
					
					 It conveyed news that meetings of voters took place at all constituencies across the country to nominate him as a candidate for deputy to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 It informed the readers that the Association and organizations affiliated to it studied the New Year address made by him and held meetings to vow to carry out the tasks laid down in it.
					
					 It carried articles titled "We significantly celebrate the 72nd birth anniversary of the great General", "Exploits performed by Kim Jong Il all his life represent his total dedication to people", "General and CNC (15) " and so on.
					
					 Seen in the magazine are the crucial proposal made by the National Defence Commission of the DPRK to the south Korean authorities calling for paving a wide avenue for improving the north-south relations by concerted efforts of the Korean nation and statements issued by organizations of Koreans in China in support of it.
					
					 Also seen in the magazine are articles calling for the reunification of Korea such as "Reunification represents the life and soul of the nation."
					
					 It conveyed news of the DPRK-China friendship joint meeting held in the homeland on the lunar New Year's Day in 2014 and a ground-breaking ceremony for building shopping street in East Pyongyang area and world news.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean Military Alliance Denounced by Chinese Internet Homepage
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean Military Alliance Denounced by Chinese Internet Homepage 
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- An article titled "When North and South Korea Work on Rapprochement, U.S. Attempts to Attack North in the Guise of 'Military Drills'" was posted on the Chinese internet homepage 4th Media News on February 25.
					 The article said:
					
					 The U.S. should stop its military presence in south Korea, not only because south Korea does not belong to the U.S. but because the highly militarized alliance between the U.S. and south Korea doesn't actually weaken the DPRK.
					
					 Every year, the U.S. and south Korea team up for one of the world's largest military exercises.
					
					 Thousands of troops backed by fighter aircraft, strategic bombers and navy warships are mobilized in the exercise.
					
					 America's elite Special Operations Forces are also involved.
					
					 The article laid bare the size and purpose, form and contents of the U.S.-south Korean joint military exercises which were staged last year.
					
					 The U.S. is staging the large-scale military exercise, one of the biggest in the world, in south Korea to threaten Pyongyang, the article noted.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Open Letter Posted by Swiss Organizations on Their Websites
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Open Letter Posted by Swiss Organizations on Their Websites
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's open letter "To All Voters across the Country" was separately posted by the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on their websites on February 20.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Observed in Nigeria, Austria
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Observed in Nigeria, Austria
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Nigeria and Austria to mark the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's proclamation of the programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on February 18 and 19.
					 A seminar on a work of Marshal Kim Jong Un was held by the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies and round-table talks were sponsored by the Vienna, 21 County Committee of the Communist Party of Austria.
					
					 The acting chairman of the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies who is also a professor at Nasarawa State University explained and proved that Kim Jong Un in his famous work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" clarified that to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 The programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is a revolutionary succession to the programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism set forth by Kim Jong Il on Feb. 19, 1974 and its development on a new higher level.
					
					 Heinrich Gruber, coordinator of the above-said county committee of the Communist Party of Austria, and other speakers said the WPK has registered big successes in the building of socialism and in the movement for national reunification under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 They wished the WPK and the Korean people bigger successes in their efforts to build a thriving nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
